thread.title: Live music performances on television shows this week include:
thread.title_full: Live music performances on television shows this week include:

title: Live music performances on television shows this week include:
text:
Published: Tue, October 20, 2015 @ 12:00 a.m. 
Live music performances on television shows this week include: 
v Jay-Z: Tonight on “Jimmy Kimmel Live” (ABC) 
v Willie Nelson and John Mellencamp: Tonight on “Late Show With Stephen Colbert” (CBS) 
v Justin Bieber: Wednesday on “Tonight Show With Jimmy Fallon” (NBC) 
v Carrie Underwood: Thursday on “Tonight Show With Jimmy Fallon” (NBC) 
v Public Enemy: Friday on “Jimmy Kimmel Live” (ABC) 
“It’s the Great Pumpkin, Charlie Brown” (8 p.m., ABC): It’s time for this holiday classic. 
“The Grinder” (8:30 P.M., FOX): People need to watch this show. It’s funny and deserves a second season. 
“Being Mary Jane” (9 p.m., BET): There’s even more turbulence for TV anchorwoman Mary Jane Paul (Gabrielle Union) as Season 3 of this addictive drama begins. 
“Frontline” (9 P.M., PBS): This episode looks at immigration reform from both sides. 
“Sweat Inc.” (10 p.m., SpikeTV): “Sweat Inc.” is a new reality series that has former “The Biggest Loser” trainer Jillian Michaels searching for America’s next fitness craze. 
“Tiny House Hunters” (10 p.m., HGTV): Hold on, are the houses tiny or the people who hunt them? In today’s reality show landscape, that’s a legitimate question. Other stories of interest
